assistant.title.description: The document title of the assistant page.

assistant.p1.message: In order to make your life easier, this assistant will tweak your Thunderbird setup to ensure you enjoy the optimal experience. We don't want you to feel dissatisfied!

assistant.p2.message: The tweaks we make are all reversible, so don't worry: should you not enjoy Thunderbird Conversations, we will revert any preference change we made as soon as you uninstall the extension.
